post.description: Creates a user and returns a JWT for immediate authentication.
Validates credentials and returns a JWT on success.

get.description: Returns the current user profile derived from JWT claims.

post.description: Admin-only. Creates a column in the lane. Returns the resource with ETag.

get.description: Returns columns for the lane.
Returns a column in the lane. Sets ETag.

delete.description: Admin-only. Deletes a column using optimistic concurrency (If-Match).

parameters.name: If-Match
parameters.description: ETag from previous GET. Accepts multiple values and weak/strong: W/"base64" or "base64".

patch.description: Admin-only. Renames a column using optimistic concurrency (If-Match). Returns the updated resource and ETag.

parameters.name: If-Match
parameters.description: ETag from previous GET. Accepts multiple values and weak/strong: W/"base64" or "base64".

patch.description: Admin-only. Changes column order using optimistic concurrency (If-Match). Returns the updated resource and ETag.

parameters.description: ETag from previous GET. Accepts multiple values and weak/strong: W/"base64" or "base64".

Returns lanes for the project.

get.description: Returns project members. Can include removed members.

parameters.description: ETag from previous GET. Accepts multiple values and weak/strong: W/"base64" or "base64".

parameters.description: ETag from previous GET. Accepts multiple values and weak/strong: W/"base64" or "base64".

get.description: Returns the number of active projects for the authenticated user.
Admin-only. Returns the number of active projects for the specified user.
Returns projects where the caller has at least reader rights. Respects optional filters.

post.description: Creates a project owned by the caller. Returns the resource with ETag.

get.description: Returns the project if the caller has reader rights. Sets ETag.

delete.description: Owner-only. Deletes the project using optimistic concurrency (If-Match).

parameters.name: If-Match
parameters.description: ETag from previous GET. Accepts multiple values and weak/strong: W/"base64" or "base64".

get.description: Admin-only. Returns projects accessible to the specified user.

patch.description: Updates the project name using optimistic concurrency (If-Match). Returns the updated resource and ETag.

parameters.name: If-Match
parameters.description: ETag from previous GET. Accepts multiple values and weak/strong: W/"base64" or "base64".

get.description: Returns activities for the task. Optional filter by activity type.
Returns a single activity if it belongs to a project the user can read.
Returns activities performed by the authenticated user.
Admin-only. Returns activities performed by the specified user.
Returns all assignments for the task.

post.description: Admin-only. Creates or updates a task assignment. Returns the resource with ETag (201 if created, 200 if updated).

get.description: Returns a users assignment for the task. Sets ETag.

delete.description: Admin-only. Removes a task assignment using optimistic concurrency (If-Match).
